definition: Huize county in Qujing 曲靖[Qu3 jing4], Yunnan
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
pool/pond/(of metals etc) luster/favor or beneficence/damp/moist
Huize county in Qujing 曲靖[Qu3 jing4], Yunnan

sentences.english: A third workshop employing stone moulds for iron casting has recently been found in Huize county, Yunnan province.
sentences.chinese: 最近在雲南會澤縣發現了第三處石範鑄鐵作坊。
